amendment.description: To strike the reinstatement of the tax on employee health insurance premiums and health plan benefits.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2917 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2917 proposed by Senator Reid to Amendment SA 2916. (consideration: CR S8354; text: CR S8354) To strike the reinstatement of the tax on employee health insurance premiums and health plan benefits.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2917 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2917 proposed by Senator Reid to Amendment SA 2916.
